messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Help me collect the basic electoral information of 50 U.S. states in 2024. 1) the number of congressional districts; 2) number of electors; 3) the name of the governor in 2024 and his/her party affiliation, like "Gavin Newsom (D)"; 4) the names of the two senators in 2024 and their party affiliations separately.

Please present the information in one Markdown table with these column headers: State, Number of Congressional Districts, Number of Electors, Governor (Party), Senator 1 (Party) & Senator 2 (Party) 

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.

For example, 
```markdown
| State           | Number of Congressional Districts | Number of Electors | Governor (Party)     | Senator 1 (Party)& Senator 2 (Party) |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------|--------------------|----------------------|-------------------|-------------------|
| Alabama         | 7                                 | 9                  | Kay Ivey (R)         | Tommy Tuberville (R)& Katie Britt (R)   |?

<think>
I need to gather information on the number of congressional districts, electors, governors and their parties for each state, as well as the senators and their parties. This seems like a large task requiring multiple searches.
</think>

<search> number of congressional districts per state 2024 </search>

Search query: number of congressional districts per state 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.britannica.com/topic/United-States-House-of-Representatives-Seats-by-State-1787120):
Number of U.S. House of Representatives Seats by State - Britannica How many representatives in the U.S. Congress does your state have? Use the map and table below to find out.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_United_States_congressional_districts):
List of United States congressional districts - Wikipedia Congressional districts in the United States are electoral divisions for the purpose of electing members of the United States House of Representatives.

[Doc 3](https://www.govtrack.us/congress/members/map):
Members of Congress & Congressional District Maps - GovTrack.us Find your representative (aka congressman or congresswoman) by entering your address or clicking a district in the map.

Search query: number of electors per state 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.archives.gov/electoral-college/allocation):
Distribution of Electoral Votes | National Archives Allocation among the States Electoral votes are allocated among the States based on the Census. Every State is allocated a number of votes equal to the ...

[Doc 2](https://usafacts.org/visualizations/electoral-college-states-representation/):
How is each state represented in the Electoral College? - USAFacts Twenty states are overrepresented in the Electoral College by more than one vote, based on population. Texas is underrepresented by nine votes.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Electoral_College):
United States Electoral College - Wikipedia In the United States, the Electoral College is the group of presidential electors that is formed every four years for the sole purpose of voting for the ...

Search query: current governors and their parties 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_current_United_States_governors):
List of current United States governors - Wikipedia The United States has 50 states and 5 territories that each elect a governor to serve as chief executive of the state or territorial government.

[Doc 2](https://www.nga.org/governors/):
Current Governors - National Governors Association The National Governors Association provides informative gubernatorial resources, including current Governors' biographies and terms in office.

[Doc 3](https://governors.rutgers.edu/fast-facts-about-americas-governors/):
Fast Facts About America's Governors Eleven states held gubernatorial elections in 2024. While there was not much activity in terms of party—in fact, no states changed party in this election ...

Search query: current senators and their parties 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.senate.gov/senators/):
U.S. Senate Information about Current Senators. Party Division 119th Congress • Majority Party: Republicans (53 seats) • Minority Party: Democrats (45 seats)

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_current_United_States_senators):
List of current United States senators - Wikipedia As of January 2025, there are 53 Republican senators, 45 Democratic senators, and two independent senators who caucus with the Democrats. ... Democratic Party, 45.

[Doc 3](https://www.congress.gov/crs-product/R48535):
Membership of the 119th Congress: A Profile Current Congress, All Congresses, Legislation, Committee Materials, Congressional Record, Members, Nominations. Search Within. GO. Congressional ...

Now I have gathered enough data from the searches, but I realize I still need specific data on governors and senators for each state for 2024 which isn't available easily through general searches, and I'll have to manually compile it. I'll start with compiling the information:
